synopsis.text: In the far future, humans come across an alien planet called Pasatorine. The inhabitants of Pasatorine initiate a mysterious plan referred to as the "Cleopatra Plan," named after the famous Egyptian queen from Earth's history. Puzzled by this connection, the military sends three soldiers' minds back in time to study Cleopatra's life and uncover the meaning behind the aliens' plan. The soldiers arrive in ancient Egypt during the rule of Ptolemy, Cleopatra's elder brother. Egypt is under threat from Julius Caesar and the expanding Roman Empire. To save Egypt, Cleopatra undergoes a procedure to make her irresistible to Caesar. She succeeds in charming Caesar but secretly plans to assassinate him once she gains his trust. Meanwhile in the future, a space station crew discusses theories about the "Cleopatra Plan." Unable to decipher the intent behind the name, they decide to send three people back to Cleopatra's era to observe key events and figures like Caesar and Marc Antony. By witnessing history firsthand, they hope to comprehend why their alien foes named their covert plan after an ancient Earth queen.
